product_name: Scarpa Tempo Trail Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Scarpa Tempo trail-running shoes feature lightweight yet sturdy support and plenty of mesh for optimal drainage in case you hit a puddle or two on your path. 6mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a mid- or forefoot strike to reduce the impact of heel-striking and braking; 6mm drop falls between traditional and minimalist shoes. Partially recycled synthetic leather and mesh uppers offer optimal support and breathability; thermoplastic urethane heel overlays stabilize heels. Partially recycled polyester linings wick away moisture to keep feet dry and reduce rubbing and blister formation. Multi-density EVA foam midsoles cushion feet and absorb shock; ESS forefoot plates offer stability and protect feet and reduce rock bruising. Scarpa Tempo trail-running shoes feature rugged rubber outsoles with deep lugs to provide excellent traction on uneven terrain. Closeout.
short_description: The Scarpa Tempo trail-running shoes feature lightweight yet sturdy support and plenty of mesh for optimal drainage in case you hit a puddle or two on your path.
